content: That's great to know. I was worried I'd have to buy a whole new set of lenses. Since I've had my D850 for about a year and a half now, and it's still my go-to camera for most shoots, I'm thinking of getting a second camera body as a backup. Do you think the Z6 would be a good choice as a backup, or should I consider other options like the D500 or D5?
